MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry, affecting properties in Llansilin, Trefonen and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.08PM.  In order to complete repairs to our overhead line network, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 1.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.51PM on 25th March 2021.
